trans-unit.resname: LCC·1 | Admiral Brass, Unsinkable | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Admiral Brass, Unsinkable
trans-unit.target: 不沉传奇霸司总帅

trans-unit.resname: LCC·1 | Admiral Brass, Unsinkable | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill four cards.\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, you may return target Pirate creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. It has base power and toughness 4/4. It gains haste until end of turn. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨四张牌。 在你回合的战斗开始时，你可以将目标海盗生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且其上有一个终命指示物。它的基础力量与防御力为4/4。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。（如果其上有终命指示物的生物将死去，则改为放逐之。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·2 | Clavileño, First of the Blessed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Clavileño, First of the Blessed
trans-unit.target: 受福众首克莱维诺

trans-unit.resname: LCC·2 | Clavileño, First of the Blessed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, target attacking Vampire that isn't a Demon becomes a Demon in addition to its other types. It gains "When this creature dies, draw a card and create a tapped 4/3 white and black Vampire Demon creature token with flying."
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，目标进行攻击且不是恶魔的吸血鬼成为恶魔，且仍具有原本类别。它获得「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌且派出一个已横置的4/3，黑白双色，具飞行异能的吸血鬼／恶魔衍生生物。」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·3 | Hakbal of the Surging Soul | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hakbal of the Surging Soul
trans-unit.target: 翻涌之魂哈巴尔

trans-unit.resname: LCC·3 | Hakbal of the Surging Soul | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, each Merfolk creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the exploring creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you don't, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，令每个由你操控的人鱼勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在令之勘察的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。） 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以将一张地牌从你手上放进战场。若你未如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·4 | Pantlaza, Sun-Favored | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pantlaza, Sun-Favored
trans-unit.target: 烈阳眷恩潘塔札

trans-unit.resname: LCC·4 | Pantlaza, Sun-Favored | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may discover X, where X is that creature's toughness. Do this only once each turn. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个恐龙在你的操控下进战场时，你可以倾探X，X为该生物的防御力。每回合只能如此作一次。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher
trans-unit.target: 残忍天行客卡门

trans-unit.resname: LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever a player sacrifices a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME and you gain 1 life.\nWhenever Carmen attacks, return up to one target permanent card with mana value less than or equal to Carmen's power from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当任一牌手牺牲一个永久物时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物且你获得1点生命。 每当卡门攻击时，将至多一张目标法术力值等于或小于卡门力量的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Don Andres, the Renegade
trans-unit.target: 变节军将唐安德烈

trans-unit.resname: LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control but don't own gets +2/+2, has menace and deathtouch, and is a Pirate in addition to its other types.\nWhenever you cast a noncreature spell you don't own, create two tapped Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控但不由你拥有的生物各得+2/+2，具有威慑与死触异能，且额外具有海盗此生物类别。 每当你施放不由你拥有的非生物咒语时，派出两个已横置的珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why climb the tangled rigging of the Legion of Dusk's hierarchy when I can fly a free flag of my own?"
trans-unit.target: 「如果我能够自立旗帜，又何必依照暮影军团的繁缛章法循阶晋升？」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wayta, Trainer Prodigy
trans-unit.target: 驯龙逸才薇塔

trans-unit.resname: LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\n{2}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature. This ability costs {2} less to activate if it targets two creatures you control.\nIf a creature you control being dealt damage causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 {2}{G}，{T}：目标由你操控的生物与另一个目标生物互斗。如果此异能以两个由你操控的生物为目标，则减少{2}来起动。 如果由你操控之永久物的触发式异能因由你操控的生物受到伤害而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·8 | Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood
trans-unit.target: 笑面浪涛索拉托雅

trans-unit.resname: LCC·8 | Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it.\nAt the beginning of your end step, untap each permanent you control with a counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，在目标地上放置一个洪水指示物。只要该地上有洪水指示物，它便额外具有海岛此地类别。 在你的结束步骤开始时，重置所有由你操控且其上有指示物的永久物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·9 | Illustrious Wanderglyph | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Illustrious Wanderglyph
trans-unit.target: 辉亮漫游石

trans-unit.resname: LCC·9 | Illustrious Wanderglyph | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)\nOther artifact creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.\nAt the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 登殿（如果你操控十个或更多永久物，则于这盘游戏接下来的时段中，你得到黄金城祝福。） 只要你有黄金城祝福，由你操控的其他神器生物便得+2/+2。 在每个维持开始时，派出一个1/1无色地侏衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Altar of the Wretched | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Altar of the Wretched
trans-unit.target: 卑骨祭坛

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Altar of the Wretched | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a nontoken creature. If you do, draw X cards, then mill X cards, where X is that creature's power.\nCraft with one or more creatures {2}{B}{B}\n{2}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Wretched Bonemass | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wretched Bonemass
trans-unit.target: 卑劣骨群

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Wretched Bonemass | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the total power of the exiled cards used to craft it.\nCARDNAME has flying as long as an exiled card used to craft it has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于化炼它所放逐之牌的力量总和。 只要某张化炼CARDNAME所放逐之牌具有飞行异能，它便具有飞行；且先攻、连击、死触、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、保护、延势、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·11 | Ore-Rich Stalactite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ore-Rich Stalactite
trans-unit.target: 富矿钟乳石

trans-unit.resname: LCC·11 | Ore-Rich Stalactite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.\nCraft with four or more red instant and/or sorcery cards {3}{R}{R} ({3}{R}{R}, Exile this artifact, Exile the four or more from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}。此法术力只能用来施放瞬间或法术咒语。 以四张或更多红色瞬间和／或法术牌化炼{3}{R}{R}（{3}{R}{R}，放逐此神器，从你坟墓场放逐前述物件达四个以上：将此派在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·11 | Cosmium Catalyst | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cosmium Catalyst
trans-unit.target: 宇金触媒

trans-unit.resname: LCC·11 | Cosmium Catalyst | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}, {T}: Choose an exiled card used to craft CARDNAME at random. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}，{T}：随机选择一张化炼CARDNAME所放逐之牌。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·11 | Cosmium Catalyst | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Deep goblins laugh at humans' wands. They cast spells with their hammers.
trans-unit.target: 深渊鬼怪嘲笑人类施法时还要用法杖。他们都是直接用锤子。

trans-unit.target: 利爪争斗

trans-unit.resname: LCC·12 | Contest of Claws | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature. If excess damage was dealt this way, discover X, where X is that excess damage. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对另一个目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。如果以此法造成过量伤害，则倾探X，X为该过量伤害之数值。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.target: 侏械斗士铁钦

trans-unit.resname: LCC·13 | Tetzin, Gnome Champion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever Tetzin or another double-faced artifact enters the battlefield under your control, mill three cards. You may put an artifact card from among them into your hand.\nCraft with six artifacts {4} ({4}, Exile this artifact, Exile the six from among other permanents you control and/or cards from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 每当铁钦或另一个双面神器在你的操控下进战场时，磨三张牌。你可以将其中的一张神器牌置于你手上。 以六个神器化炼{4}（{4}，放逐此神器，从由你操控的其他永久物和／或你坟墓场的牌中放逐前述物件达六个：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.source: The Golden-Gear Colossus
trans-unit.target: 金轮巨像

trans-unit.resname: LCC·13 | The Golden-Gear Colossus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, trample\nWhenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, transform up to one other target double-faced artifact you control. Create two 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 警戒，践踏 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，转化至多另一个目标由你操控的双面神器。派出两个1/1无色地侏衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·13 | The Golden-Gear Colossus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The sum is greater than the parts.
trans-unit.target: 整体之力，更胜各部之和。

(Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)\n{T}, Sacrifice another creature: Proliferate. Activate only as a sorcery. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，从另一个由你操控的永久物上移去一个指示物：殖民。只能于法术时机起动。（派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。） {T}，牺牲另一个生物：增殖。只能于法术时机起动。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。于它进战场时，选择一种牌张类别，且须是化炼它所放逐之两张牌所具有之共通者。 {T}：对你本回合中施放的下一个该类别咒语而言，能以「不支付其法术力费用」的方式来施放。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·15 | Apex Observatory | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though they had never left the Core, the Oltec knew the stars.
trans-unit.target: 欧尔特克人虽从未离开世界核心，但亦知星界存在。

The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于用以化炼它所放逐之牌的力量总和。 只要某张用以化炼CARDNAME所放逐之牌具有飞行异能，它便具有飞行；且先攻、连击、死触、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、保护、延势、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.target: 司命宝箱

trans-unit.resname: LCC·50 | The Grim Captain's Locker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Surveil 1.\n{T}: Until end of turn, each creature card in your graveyard gains "Escape—{3}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard."
trans-unit.target: {T}：刺探1。 {T}：直到回合结束，每张在你坟墓场中的生物牌均获得「逸脱～{3}{B}，从你的坟墓场放逐四张其他牌。」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·51 | Master of Dark Rites | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Master of Dark Rites
trans-unit.target: 黯仪大师

trans-unit.resname: LCC·51 | Master of Dark Rites | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Add {B}{B}{B}. Spend this mana only to cast Vampire, Cleric, and/or Demon spells.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物：加{B}{B}{B}。此法术力只能用来施放吸血鬼，僧侣和／或恶魔咒语。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·51 | Master of Dark Rites | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With each sacrifice, we step closer to the Age of Everflowing Blood."
trans-unit.target: 「每次献祭，都朝朱光时代更近一步。」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·52 | Promise of Aclazotz | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Promise of Aclazotz
trans-unit.target: 阿洛佐兹之诺

trans-unit.resname: LCC·52 | Promise of Aclazotz | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a non-Demon creature. If you do, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以牺牲一个非恶魔生物。若你如此作，则殖民。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·52 | Foul Rebirth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Foul Rebirth
trans-unit.target: 邪秽再生

trans-unit.resname: LCC·52 | Foul Rebirth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a non-Demon creature. If you do, create a 4/3 white and black Vampire Demon creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个非恶魔生物。若你如此作，则派出一个4/3，白黑双色，具飞行异能的吸血鬼／恶魔衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·53 | Skeleton Crew | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skeleton Crew
trans-unit.target: 骷髅妖船员

trans-unit.resname: LCC·53 | Skeleton Crew | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each other creature you control that's a Skeleton or Pirate gets +1/+1.\nWhenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Skeleton Pirate creature token. (This ability triggers only from the battlefield.)\n{5}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且为骷髅妖或海盗的其他生物各得+1/+1。 每当一张或数张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，派出一个2/2黑色骷髅妖／海盗衍生生物。（此异能只会从战场上触发。） {5}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·54 | Broadside Bombardiers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Broadside Bombardiers
trans-unit.target: 舷侧炮手

trans-unit.resname: LCC·54 | Broadside Bombardiers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace, haste\nBoast — Sacrifice another creature or artifact: CARDNAME deals damage equal to 2 plus the sacrificed permanent's mana value to any target.
trans-unit.target: 威慑，敏捷 炫威～牺牲另一个生物或神器：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成伤害，其数量等同于所牺牲之永久物的法术力值加2。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·54 | Broadside Bombardiers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When they ran short on cannonballs, they went for the pots and pans.
trans-unit.target: 他们用完炮弹之后，就开始用锅碗瓢盆了。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·55 | Gemcutter Buccaneer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gemcutter Buccaneer
trans-unit.target: 切石海贼

trans-unit.resname: LCC·55 | Gemcutter Buccaneer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, create a tapped Treasure token.\nTreasures you control are Equipment in addition to their other types and have "Equipped creature gets +2/+0," equip Pirate {1}, and equip {3}.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个海盗在你操控下进战场时，派出一个已横置的珍宝衍生物。 由你操控的珍宝额外具有武具此类别，且具有「佩带此武具的生物得+2/+0」、佩带海盗{1}与佩带{3}。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·56 | Wrathful Raptors | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wrathful Raptors
trans-unit.target: 怨怒迅猛龙

trans-unit.resname: LCC·56 | Wrathful Raptors | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever a Dinosaur you control is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target that isn't a Dinosaur.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当一个由你操控的恐龙受到伤害时，它对任意一个不为恐龙之目标造成等量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·56 | Wrathful Raptors | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: They gulp down their prey on the run, claws dripping with blood as they hunt for their next meal.
trans-unit.target: 它们一口吞下逃窜的猎物，不待爪上血液滴尽就去猎捕下顿目标。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·57 | Bygone Marvels | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bygone Marvels
trans-unit.target: 过往奇威

trans-unit.resname: LCC·57 | Bygone Marvels | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Descend 8 — When you cast this spell, if there are eight or more permanent cards in your graveyard, copy this spell twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.\nReturn target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 落坟8～当你施放此咒语时，若你坟墓场中有八张或更多永久物牌，则将此咒语复制两次。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。 将目标永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·58 | Curious Altisaur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curious Altisaur
trans-unit.target: 好奇硕伟龙

trans-unit.resname: LCC·58 | Curious Altisaur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, reach\nWhenever a Dinosaur you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 警戒，延势 每当一个由你操控的恐龙对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·58 | Curious Altisaur | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After long days of squeezing through cramped tunnels, the Sun Empire's dinosaurs were overjoyed to stretch their necks and survey the wonders of the Core.
trans-unit.target: 在经历数日在狭窄隧道中蜷缩挤行之后，烈阳帝国的恐龙终能欣喜地伸展颈脖，自由探索世界核心的奇景。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·59 | Deeproot Historian | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deeproot Historian
trans-unit.target: 繁根林史家

trans-unit.resname: LCC·59 | Deeproot Historian | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Merfolk and Druid cards in your graveyard have retrace.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中的人鱼与德鲁伊牌都具有追溯异能。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·59 | Deeproot Historian | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The language of the Komon Winaq has much in common with the tongue of our ancestors. Surely the two peoples once lived and worked in close harmony."
trans-unit.target: 「科门维纳的语言与吾人先祖所用者有诸多共通之处。他们两族人一定曾紧密协作，和谐共存。」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·60 | Dinosaur Egg | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dinosaur Egg
trans-unit.target: 恐龙蛋

trans-unit.resname: LCC·60 | Dinosaur Egg | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Evolve\nWhen CARDNAME dies, you may discover X, where X is its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 进化 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以倾探X，X为其防御力。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·60 | Dinosaur Egg | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Oltec revere dinosaurs as living remnants of the bygone Fourth Age.
trans-unit.target: 欧尔特克人将恐龙视作早已远去之第四纪活化石，对其尊敬有加。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·61 | Scion of Calamity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scion of Calamity
trans-unit.target: 始灾后裔

trans-unit.resname: LCC·61 | Scion of Calamity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Myriad\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 繁影 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，消灭目标由该牌手操控的神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·62 | Sunfrill Imitator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunfrill Imitator
trans-unit.target: 展威阳褶龙

trans-unit.resname: LCC·62 | Sunfrill Imitator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may have it become a copy of another target Dinosaur you control, except its name is CARDNAME and it has this ability.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以使其成为另一个目标由你操控之恐龙的复制品，但其名称仍是CARDNAME且具有此异能。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·62 | Sunfrill Imitator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With a flare of plumage and an earthshaking bellow, it can scare off predators three times its size.
trans-unit.target: 依靠炫目羽毛和撼地咆哮，它能吓跑体型大它三倍的掠食者。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·63 | Topography Tracker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Topography Tracker
trans-unit.target: 地势追迹师

trans-unit.resname: LCC·63 | Topography Tracker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Map token.\nIf a creature you control would explore, instead it explores, then it explores again.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个地图衍生物。 如果某个由你操控的生物将勘察，则改为它勘察，然后它再勘察。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·63 | Topography Tracker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Good thing I'm not afraid of heights."
trans-unit.target: 「幸好我不恐高。」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·64 | Tributary Instructor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tributary Instructor
trans-unit.target: 纳物讲师

trans-unit.resname: LCC·64 | Tributary Instructor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Mentor\nWhenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 训导 每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物死去时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·64 | Tributary Instructor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Like water between rivers, wisdom must flow freely from one generation to the next."
trans-unit.target: 「正如水流会在河川之间自由来往，智慧也必须能向下一代自由传递。」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·65 | Order of Sacred Dusk | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Order of Sacred Dusk
trans-unit.target: 神圣暮影军团

trans-unit.resname: LCC·65 | Order of Sacred Dusk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Convoke\nFlying, lifelink, exalted, haste\nOther Vampires you control have exalted.
trans-unit.target: 召集 飞行，系命，颂威，敏捷 由你操控的其他吸血鬼具有颂威异能。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·66 | Singer of Swift Rivers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Singer of Swift Rivers
trans-unit.target: 急流歌者

trans-unit.resname: LCC·66 | Singer of Swift Rivers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a shield counter on another target creature you control.\nYou may cast Merfolk spells as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，在另一个目标由你操控的生物上放置一个后盾指示物。 你可以将人鱼咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·67 | Arm-Mounted Anchor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arm-Mounted Anchor
trans-unit.target: 臂发击锚

trans-unit.resname: LCC·67 | Arm-Mounted Anchor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has menace.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw two cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a Pirate card.\nEquip {2}. This ability costs {2} less to activate if you have one or fewer cards in hand.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+2且具有威慑异能。 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓两张牌。然后除非你弃一张海盗牌，否则弃两张牌。 佩带{2}。如果你的手牌为一张或更少，则此异能减少{2}来起动。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·68 | Progenitor's Icon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Progenitor's Icon
trans-unit.target: 原祖符示

trans-unit.resname: LCC·68 | Progenitor's Icon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color.\n{T}: The next spell of the chosen type you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。 {T}：你本回合中施放的下一个该类别咒语能视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·101 | Archaeomancer's Map | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Archaeomancer's Map
trans-unit.target: 古语术士地图

trans-unit.resname: LCC·101 | Archaeomancer's Map | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for up to two basic Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.\nWhenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player controls more lands than you, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻至多两张基本的平原牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。 每当一个地在对手的操控下进战场时，若该牌手操控的地比你多，则你可以将一张地牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·102 | Wedding Ring | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wedding Ring
trans-unit.target: 婚戒

trans-unit.resname: LCC·102 | Wedding Ring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was cast, target opponent creates a token that's a copy of it.\nWhenever an opponent who controls an artifact named CARDNAME draws a card during their turn, you draw a card.\nWhenever an opponent who controls an artifact named CARDNAME gains life during their turn, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它经牌手施放，则目标对手派出一个为其复制品的衍生物。 每当任一操控名称为CARDNAME的神器之对手于其回合中抓一张牌时，你抓一张牌。 每当任一操控名称为CARDNAME的神器之对手于其回合中获得生命时，你获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·103 | Amulet of Vigor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Amulet of Vigor
trans-unit.target: 活力护身符

trans-unit.resname: LCC·103 | Amulet of Vigor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield tapped and under your control, untap it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个永久物在你的操控下横置进战场时，将它重置。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·103 | Amulet of Vigor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Everyone is obsessed with this cosmium stuff, but I can sense some kind of comparable power in this droplet of ancient amber."\n—Quintorius Kand, research notes
trans-unit.target: 「人人都痴迷宇金，不过我感觉这小块远古琥珀之中，也蕴含有能与之匹敌的能量。」 ～昆托力康德，研究纪录

trans-unit.resname: LCC·104 | Arcane Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arcane Signet
trans-unit.target: 秘法印记

trans-unit.resname: LCC·104 | Arcane Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·104 | Arcane Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Markings on the hilt are faded, but resemble Komon Winaq familial glyphs. Relic recovered for further study."\n—Oltec archaeological survey
trans-unit.target: 「锤柄上的印记已难以辨认，但看起来像是科门维纳家族的徽章。已回收古物作深入分析。」 ～欧尔特克考古勘察纪录

trans-unit.resname: LCC·105 | Chalice of the Void | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chalice of the Void
trans-unit.target: 虚空圣杯

trans-unit.resname: LCC·105 | Chalice of the Void | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.\nWhenever a player casts a spell with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on CARDNAME, counter that spell.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个充电指示物。 每当任一牌手施放法术力值等同于CARDNAME上充电指示物数量的咒语时，反击该咒语。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·106 | Chimil, the Inner Sun | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chimil, the Inner Sun
trans-unit.target: 内阳奇密理

trans-unit.resname: LCC·106 | Chimil, the Inner Sun | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Spells you control can't be countered.\nAt the beginning of your end step, discover 5.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的咒语不能被反击。 在你的结束步骤开始时，倾探5。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·107 | Chromatic Orrery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chromatic Orrery
trans-unit.target: 五彩星象仪

trans-unit.resname: LCC·107 | Chromatic Orrery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.\n{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}{C}{C}.\n{5}, {T}: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付费用。 {T}：加{C}{C}{C}{C}{C}。 {5}，{T}：由你操控的永久物中每包括一种颜色，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·108 | Coat of Arms | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coat of Arms
trans-unit.target: 武装外衣

trans-unit.resname: LCC·108 | Coat of Arms | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, two Vampire Clerics and a Human Cleric would each get +2/+2.)
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，战场上每有一个与它具共通生物类别的其他生物，它便得+1/+1。（举例来说，有两个吸血鬼／僧侣和一个人类／僧侣的话，便会各得+2/+2）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·108 | Coat of Arms | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The rose is common in Legion heraldry. Thorns and petals tell of specific family achievements."\n—Quintorius Kand, research notes
trans-unit.target: 「暮影军团各部徽章常以蔷薇作主体，而周围的尖刺及花瓣，则代表相应的家族成就。」 ～昆托力康德，研究纪录

trans-unit.resname: LCC·109 | Coercive Portal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coercive Portal
trans-unit.target: 胁迫通道

trans-unit.resname: LCC·109 | Coercive Portal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — At the beginning of your upkeep, starting with you, each player votes for carnage or homage. If carnage gets more votes, sacrifice CARDNAME and destroy all nonland permanents. If homage gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 议定～在你的维持开始时，由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「杀戮」或「俸禄」。若杀戮票数较多，则牺牲CARDNAME并消灭所有非地永久物。若俸禄票数较多或两者同为最多，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·110 | Colossus Hammer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Colossus Hammer
trans-unit.target: 巨锤

trans-unit.resname: LCC·110 | Colossus Hammer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +10/+10 and loses flying.\nEquip {8}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+10/+10且失去飞行异能。 佩带{8}

trans-unit.resname: LCC·110 | Colossus Hammer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Relic retrieval is delayed. Mentioning it was forty feet tall might have helped us prepare."\n—Queen's Bay Company dispatch
trans-unit.target: 「古物回收作业延宕。倘能先告知此物高四十尺有余，或对准备工作有所助益。」 ～女王湾连队急讯

trans-unit.resname: LCC·111 | Everflowing Chalice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Everflowing Chalice
trans-unit.target: 汩汩圣杯

trans-unit.resname: LCC·111 | Everflowing Chalice | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Multikicker {2}\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.\n{T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: LCC·112 | Expedition Map | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Expedition Map
trans-unit.target: 探险地图

trans-unit.resname: LCC·112 | Expedition Map | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你牌库中搜寻一张地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·112 | Expedition Map | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Oltec maps are not simple charts of place and distance. Each tells a story of exploration and learning, celebrating the meaning beyond the discovery."\n—Huatli's travel journal
trans-unit.target: 「欧尔特克地图并非只是简单记载地点与距离的图表。每份地图字画之间都流露出探索与学习的历程，赞颂发现之外的意义。」 ～华特莉的游记

trans-unit.resname: LCC·113 | Fist of Suns | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fist of Suns
trans-unit.target: 五阳护手

trans-unit.resname: LCC·113 | Fist of Suns | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells you cast.
trans-unit.target: 你可以支付{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}，而不支付你施放之咒语的法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·113 | Fist of Suns | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Willem put it on and started shooting sparks from his hands like some kind of wizard! Was supposed to be my turn next, but the blasted thing won't come off his hand. Send help."\n—Brazen Coalition expedition dispatch
trans-unit.target: 「威廉戴上手套后，就见指尖不断射出火花，像法师一样！原本接下来该到我，但这该死的东西摘不下来了。速速来援。」 ～莽霸联盟探险队急讯

trans-unit.resname: LCC·114 | Lightning Greaves | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lightning Greaves
trans-unit.target: 迅雷护胫

trans-unit.resname: LCC·114 | Lightning Greaves | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has haste and shroud.\nEquip {0}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有敏捷与帷幕异能。 佩带{0}

trans-unit.resname: LCC·114 | Lightning Greaves | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Skim all the gold and magic rocks you want, but if I see one greasy fingerprint on my new boots, you'll be drinking bilgewater for a month."\n—Note from Captain Lannery Storm
trans-unit.target: 「黄金魔石随便拿，但谁胆敢在我新靴子上留下脏手印，就等着喝一整个月的污水。」 ～兰娜莉速腾船长手书

trans-unit.resname: LCC·115 | Mimic Vat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mimic Vat
trans-unit.target: 拟态缸

trans-unit.resname: LCC·115 | Mimic Vat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Imprint — Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you may exile that card. If you do, return each other card exiled with CARDNAME to its owner's graveyard.\n{3}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of a card exiled with CARDNAME. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 压印～每当一个非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以放逐该牌。若你如此作，则将所有以CARDNAME放逐的其他牌各移回其拥有者的坟墓场。 {3}，{T}：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为任一以CARDNAME放逐之牌的复制品。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·116 | Strionic Resonator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Strionic Resonator
trans-unit.target: 基尼共振器

trans-unit.resname: LCC·116 | Strionic Resonator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：复制目标由你操控的触发式异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·116 | Strionic Resonator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Akal theorizes that it is some sort of signal, resonating beyond this cavern's physical space. But if so, who—or what—is the signal for?"\n—Huatli's travel journal
trans-unit.target: 「阿卡认为这是某种传讯器，振荡讯号将之传出洞窟边界。如果是这样的话，这讯号是为谁而传？又为何事而传？」 ～华特莉的游记

trans-unit.resname: LCC·117 | Temple Bell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple Bell
trans-unit.target: 庙宇响钟

trans-unit.resname: LCC·117 | Temple Bell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·117 | Temple Bell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Bells ring out to mark every great moment in the Malamet's tale of years: victories and tragedies, feasts and discoveries, the ascension of each sovereign and their passage into the dark beyond."\n—Sun Empire expedition report
trans-unit.target: 「根据豹族纪录，凡是族中遭遇重大变故，便会敲响钟声铭记：包括战事胜利、遭灾遇难、粮食丰收、精彩发现、君主登基、皇帝驾崩等等。」 ～烈阳帝国探险队报告

trans-unit.resname: LCC·118 | Thought Vessel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thought Vessel
trans-unit.target: 思想容器

trans-unit.resname: LCC·118 | Thought Vessel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.\n{T}: Add {C}.
trans-unit.target: 你的手牌数量没有上限。 {T}：加{C}。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·118 | Thought Vessel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The artifact's interaction with the mycoid network seems to allow non-mycoids to connect to the gestalt consciousness. Thus far, all who have done so have fled screaming."\n—Alvaro, Dusk Legion researcher
trans-unit.target: 「此神器与智蕈触网之互动，似能让非智蕈生物也接入整体意识。可惜，如此作过的人之后都会尖叫逃窜。」 ～暮影军团研究员阿瓦罗

trans-unit.resname: LCC·119 | Whispersilk Cloak | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Whispersilk Cloak
trans-unit.target: 细语丝篷

trans-unit.resname: LCC·119 | Whispersilk Cloak | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud.\nEquip {2}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物不能被阻挡，且具有帷幕异能。 佩带{2}

trans-unit.resname: LCC·119 | Whispersilk Cloak | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It bends the light somehow, rendering it—and its wearer—functionally invisible. I never would have found it if I hadn't tripped over it!"\n—Quintorius Kand, research notes
trans-unit.target: 「它似乎能用某种方法扭曲光线，从而令它及其穿戴者不见踪影。要不是我被绊了一跤，我根本不可能发现这东西！」 ～昆托力康德，研究纪录

trans-unit.resname: LCC·120 | Worn Powerstone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Worn Powerstone
trans-unit.target: 受损的魔力石

trans-unit.resname: LCC·120 | Worn Powerstone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {C}{C}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{C}{C}。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·120 | Worn Powerstone | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The strange energy source isn't cosmium after all, but some unidentifiable material that has leached cosmium residue from the walls. Could be dangerous. Could change everything."\n—Oltec archaeological survey
trans-unit.target: 「最后，我们发现这奇妙的能源并非宇金，而是某种能从墙上吸附宇金残留的未知物质。可能会带来危险。可能会带来剧变。」 ～欧尔特克考古勘察纪录

trans-unit.resname: LCI·1 | Abuelo's Awakening | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 先父觉醒

trans-unit.resname: LCI·1 | Abuelo's Awakening | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target artifact or non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield with X additional +1/+1 counters on it. It's a 1/1 Spirit creature with flying in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器或非灵气结界牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且上面额外有X个+1/+1指示物。它是具飞行异能的1/1精怪生物，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·1 | Abuelo's Awakening | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Quintorius touched the old poncho he'd found. A rush of magic condensed into an Echo, and wise Abuelo stepped forth.
trans-unit.target: 昆托力轻轻碰了一下他刚发现的旧斗篷。未料其间魔力涌现，汇聚成念世灵之形，先父阿布罗就此现身。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·2 | Acrobatic Leap | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Acrobatic Leap
trans-unit.target: 巧躯飞跃

trans-unit.resname: LCI·2 | Acrobatic Leap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+1/+3且获得飞行异能。将它重置。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·2 | Acrobatic Leap | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the cliff began to crumble, Wayta danced fearlessly across the tumbling stones, knowing Ajij would never let her fall.
trans-unit.target: 眼见崖壁崩落，薇塔仍在滚石间轻盈跳动，脸上却毫无畏惧神色～因为她深知阿吉不会让她掉下去。

trans-unit.target: 横置两个由你操控且未横置的神器和／或生物：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·3 | Adaptive Gemguard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Left their own devices, gnomes reengineer their own devices.
trans-unit.target: 遭放任自流后，侏械便开始将自己的机械重作他用。

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为横置时，占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·4 | Attentive Sunscribe | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Few humans are steady-handed enough to match a gnome's precision. Even the slightest change to a single line can wildly alter a glyph's meaning.
trans-unit.target: 论精准稳定，鲜有人类的手工技艺能与侏械相媲美。哪怕是一条直线上的细微出入，都会极大影响雕符含义。

Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的平原牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。你获得2点生命。 以神器化炼{5}{W}{W}（{5}{W}{W}，放逐此神器，放逐另一个由你操控的神器或一张你坟墓场中的神器牌：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.source: "I love the smell of freshly baked gnomes!"\n—Yelha, Oltec artisan

trans-unit.resname: LCI·7 | Cosmium Blast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Cosmium is the tangible essence of Chimil's power. The Oltec's cosmium-laced tattoos ensure that power can be called upon when needed.
trans-unit.target: 宇金乃是奇密理威能的有形具现。欧尔特克人会在纹身图案上嵌入少许宇金，好在需要时能够让此等力量为己所用。

trans-unit.source: To their dismay, Brazen Coalition explorers soon found that the Oltec were not impressed by cannons.
trans-unit.target: 令莽霸联盟的探险者沮丧的是，他们很快就发现大炮根本打动不了欧尔特克人。

trans-unit.source: Itzmin walked away from the collapse with a new friend—and an enduring fear of heights.

trans-unit.resname: LCI·41 | Sandswirl Wanderglyph | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever an opponent casts a spell during their turn, they can't attack you or planeswalkers you control this turn.\nEach opponent who attacked you or a planeswalker you control this turn can't cast spells.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当任一对手于其回合中施放咒语时，该牌手本回合中不能攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客。 每位本回合中攻击过你或由你操控之鹏洛客的对手均不能施放咒语。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·42 | Vanguard of the Rose | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vanguard of the Rose
trans-unit.target: 蔷薇先锋

trans-unit.resname: LCI·42 | Vanguard of the Rose | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: CARDNAME gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲另一个生物或神器：CARDNAME获得不灭异能直到回合结束。将它横置。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·42 | Vanguard of the Rose | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No one soul is worth more than Torrezon's salvation. Press on."
trans-unit.target: 「没有谁的灵魂比救赎图瑞琮更重要。继续前进。」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·43 | Warden of the Inner Sky | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Warden of the Inner Sky
trans-unit.target: 内宇护卫

trans-unit.resname: LCI·43 | Warden of the Inner Sky | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME has three or more counters on it, it has flying and vigilance.\nTap three untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. Scry 1. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME上有三个或更多指示物，它便具有飞行与警戒异能。 横置三个由你操控且未横置的神器和／或生物：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。占卜1。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·44 | Akal Pakal, First Among Equals | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Akal Pakal, First Among Equals
trans-unit.target: 芸生班首阿卡帕卡

trans-unit.resname: LCI·44 | Akal Pakal, First Among Equals | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's end step, if an artifact entered the battlefield under your control this turn, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有神器在你操控下进战场，则检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·44 | Akal Pakal, First Among Equals | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "These lost children of Aclazotz are misguided, but perhaps there can be reconciliation of our ideals without war."
trans-unit.target: 「这些遭阿洛佐兹蒙蔽的孩子已走上歧途，但仍有一丝不必诉诸战争便能和解的机会。」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·45 | Ancestral Reminiscence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ancestral Reminiscence
trans-unit.target: 追忆先祖

trans-unit.resname: LCI·45 | Ancestral Reminiscence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·45 | Ancestral Reminiscence | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A typical conversation with Echoes is three parts wisdom and one part gossip.
trans-unit.target: 当与念世灵对话时，往往是七分求知智慧，三分闲话家常。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·46 | Brackish Blunder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brackish Blunder
trans-unit.target: 咸水苦难

trans-unit.resname: LCI·46 | Brackish Blunder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If it was tapped, create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。如果它已横置，则派出一个地图衍生物。（它是具有「{1}，{T}，牺牲此神器：令目标由你操控的生物勘察。只能于法术时机起动」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·46 | Brackish Blunder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When the Malamet told him to avoid the river, he thought they meant it wasn't safe to drink.
trans-unit.target: 当豹人跟他说别碰这条河时，他以为只是在提醒他别喝这的水。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·47 | Braided Net | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Braided Net
trans-unit.target: 织辫渔网

trans-unit.resname: LCI·47 | Braided Net | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with three net counters on it.\n{T}, Remove a net counter from CARDNAME: Tap another target nonland permanent. Its activated abilities can't be activated for as long as it remains tapped.\nCraft with artifact {1}{U}

trans-unit.resname: LCI·47 | Braided Quipu | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Braided Quipu
trans-unit.target: 织辫奇普结

trans-unit.resname: LCI·47 | Braided Quipu | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}, {T}: Draw a card for each artifact you control, then put CARDNAME into its owner's library third from the top.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}，{T}：你每操控一个神器，便抓一张牌，然后将CARDNAME置于其拥有者的牌库顶数来第三张的位置。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·47 | Braided Quipu | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Oltec repurpose objects out of reverence rather than scarcity, believing them strengthened by the memory of each past function.
trans-unit.target: 欧尔特克人常会重造身边事物另作他用：这并非因为物质稀缺，而是他们崇敬过往，相信其往昔每段功用都令其更加牢靠。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·48 | Chart a Course | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chart a Course
trans-unit.target: 规划航路

trans-unit.resname: LCI·48 | Chart a Course | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。然后除非你本回合中攻击过，否则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·48 | Chart a Course | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the River Heralds began to decipher the ancient map, they were staggered by the vastness of the world-within-the-world that it revealed.
trans-unit.target: 随着川流使逐渐解开上古地图的奥秘，他们无不为其间展现之世中世界的广阔天地而震撼。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·49 | Cogwork Wrestler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cogwork Wrestler
trans-unit.target: 齿轮摔角械

trans-unit.resname: LCI·49 | Cogwork Wrestler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标由对手操控的生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·49 | Cogwork Wrestler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Years of adventure and adversity on the open seas did not prepare Brog for the humiliation of losing a sparring match to a cogwork doll less than half his size.
trans-unit.target: 虽然布洛葛早在惊涛骇浪中出生入死历练多年，但当他在拳赛中输给个头不及自己一半的齿轮机械时，还是很难咽下这口气。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·50 | Confounding Riddle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Confounding Riddle
trans-unit.target: 致乱谜题

trans-unit.resname: LCI·50 | Confounding Riddle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.\n• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。 •除非目标咒语的操控者支付{4}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·50 | Confounding Riddle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Explorers learned not to tamper with sites of ancient power without learning their purpose.
trans-unit.target: 探险队早已学会，在没弄清楚召力古迹的用途前，不要乱碰其中任何物品。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·51 | Council of Echoes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Council of Echoes
trans-unit.target: 念世灵议会

trans-unit.resname: LCI·51 | Council of Echoes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nDescend 4 — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard, return up to one target nonland permanent other than CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 落坟4～当CARDNAME进战场时，若你坟墓场中有四张或更多永久物牌，则将至多一个目标CARDNAME以外的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·51 | Council of Echoes | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Komon Winaq, ancestors of the Oltec, linger on as the eldest of the Echoes.
trans-unit.target: 科门维纳族人～欧尔特克人的先祖～乃是徘徊世间最古老的念世灵。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·52 | Deeproot Pilgrimage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deeproot Pilgrimage
trans-unit.target: 繁根林朝圣

trans-unit.resname: LCI·52 | Deeproot Pilgrimage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more nontoken Merfolk you control become tapped, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof.
trans-unit.target: Whenever one or more nontoken Merfolk you control become tapped, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof.

trans-unit.resname: LCI·52 | Deeproot Pilgrimage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "These glyphs are more than trail markings! They tell a story as they go. But does it end in celebration or tragedy?"
trans-unit.target: "These glyphs are more than trail markings! They tell a story as they go. But does it end in celebration or tragedy?"

trans-unit.resname: LCI·53 | Didact Echo | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Didact Echo
trans-unit.target: 布道念世灵

trans-unit.resname: LCI·53 | Didact Echo | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nDescend 4 — CARDNAME has flying as long as there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 落坟4～只要你坟墓场中有四张或更多永久物牌，CARDNAME便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·53 | Didact Echo | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The folk of the Sun Empire respect their ancestors. The Oltec go further, communing with spirits of esteemed elders after death.
trans-unit.target: 烈阳帝国的人民崇敬先祖。但欧尔特克人则更近一步，他们在尊贵长者逝后仍能直接与之对话。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·54 | Eaten by Piranhas | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eaten by Piranhas
trans-unit.target: 食人鱼撕咬

trans-unit.resname: LCI·54 | Eaten by Piranhas | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nEnchant creature\nEnchanted creature loses all abilities and is a black Skeleton creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)
trans-unit.target: 闪现 结附于生物 所结附的生物失去所有异能，且是基础力量与防御力为1/1的黑色骷髅妖生物。（它会失去其他牌张类别和生物类别。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·54 | Eaten by Piranhas | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It is ill-advised to swim where even the River Heralds do not.
trans-unit.target: 建议不要在连川流使都不去的地方下水。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·55 | The Enigma Jewel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Enigma Jewel
trans-unit.target: 谜奇珠宝

trans-unit.resname: LCI·55 | The Enigma Jewel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities.\nCraft with four or more nonlands with activated abilities {8}{U} ({8}{U}, Exile this artifact, Exile the four or more from among other permanents you control and/or cards in your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{C}{C}。此法术力只能用来起动异能。 以四个或更多具起动式异能之非地物件化炼{8}{U}（{8}{U}，放逐此神器，从由你操控的其他永久物和／或你坟墓场的牌中放逐前述化炼物件达四个或更多：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·55 | Locus of Enlightenment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Locus of Enlightenment
trans-unit.target: 启蒙之核

trans-unit.resname: LCI·55 | Locus of Enlightenment | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has each activated ability of the exiled cards used to craft it. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.\nWhenever you activate an ability that isn't a mana ability, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME具有所有用以化炼它所放逐之牌的所有起动式异能。每个此类异能每回合你都只能起动一次。 每当你起动不属法术力异能的异能时，将它复制。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·56 | The Everflowing Well | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Everflowing Well
trans-unit.target: 汩汩涌井

trans-unit.resname: LCI·56 | The Everflowing Well | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill two cards, then draw two cards.\nDescend 8 — At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are eight or more permanent cards in your graveyard, transform CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨两张牌，然后抓两张牌。 落坟8～在你的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中有八张或更多永久物牌，则转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·56 | The Myriad Pools | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Myriad Pools
trans-unit.target: 连绵灌池

trans-unit.resname: LCI·56 | The Myriad Pools | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from The Everflowing Well.)\n{T}: Add {U}.\nWhenever you cast a permanent spell using mana produced by CARDNAME, up to one other target permanent you control becomes a copy of that spell until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: （由汩汩涌井转化。） {T}：加{U}。 每当你利用CARDNAME产生之法术力来施放永久物咒语时，至多另一个目标由你操控的永久物成为该咒语的复制品直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·57 | Frilled Cave-Wurm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Frilled Cave-Wurm
trans-unit.target: 褶领洞窟亚龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·57 | Frilled Cave-Wurm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Descend 4 — CARDNAME gets +2/+0 as long as there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 落坟4～只要你坟墓场中有四张或更多永久物牌，CARDNAME便得+2/+0。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·57 | Frilled Cave-Wurm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Remember that weird salamander thing we found in the jungle stream? I think we just met its god."\n—Carella, quartermaster of the *Windshark*
trans-unit.target: 「还记得我们在丛林溪流里碰到的那条奇怪火蜥蜴吗？我想我们现在遇到它的神了。」 ～风鲨号军需官卡雷拉

trans-unit.resname: LCI·58 | Hermitic Nautilus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hermitic Nautilus
trans-unit.target: 遁世鹦鹉螺

trans-unit.resname: LCI·58 | Hermitic Nautilus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\n{1}{U}: CARDNAME gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 {1}{U}：CARDNAME得+3/-3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·58 | Hermitic Nautilus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It devoured the shell's original owner long ago, but it's just about ready to start looking for a new home—and a meal to go with it.
trans-unit.target: 它很久以前就吞掉了这个壳的旧主，不过它现在开始打起了搬新家的主意～同时还想借此美餐一顿。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·59 | Hurl into History | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hurl into History
trans-unit.target: 甩入历史

trans-unit.resname: LCI·59 | Hurl into History | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target artifact or creature spell. Discover X, where X is that spell's mana value. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 反击目标神器或生物咒语。倾探X，X为该咒语的法术力值。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·60 | Inverted Iceberg | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inverted Iceberg
trans-unit.target: 颠转冰山

trans-unit.resname: LCI·60 | Inverted Iceberg | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill a card, then draw a card. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)\nCraft with artifact {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Exile this artifact, Exile another artifact you control or an artifact card from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨一张牌，然后抓一张牌。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你坟墓场。） 以神器化炼{4}{U}{U}（{4}{U}{U}，放逐此神器，放逐另一个由你操控的神器或一张你坟墓场中的神器牌：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·60 | Iceberg Titan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Iceberg Titan
trans-unit.target: 冰山泰坦

trans-unit.resname: LCI·60 | Iceberg Titan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may tap or untap target artifact or creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以横置或重置目标神器或生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·60 | Iceberg Titan | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The force of a blizzard. The rage of a monstrosaur.
trans-unit.target: 如暴风雪般威猛。似暴霸龙般愤怒。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·61 | Kitesail Larcenist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kitesail Larcenist
trans-unit.target: 航筝盗贼

trans-unit.resname: LCI·61 | Kitesail Larcenist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, ward {1}\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each player, choose up to one other target artifact or creature that player controls. For as long as CARDNAME remains on the battlefield, the chosen permanents become Treasure artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color" and lose all other abilities.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，守护{1} 当CARDNAME进战场时，为每位牌手各进行以下流程～选择至多另一个目标由该牌手操控的神器或生物。于CARDNAME仍在战场上的时段内，所选永久物成为珍宝神器，且具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」，并失去所有其他异能。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·62 | Lodestone Needle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lodestone Needle
trans-unit.target: 磁石针尖

trans-unit.resname: LCI·62 | Lodestone Needle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap up to one target artifact or creature and put two stun counters on it.\nCraft with artifact {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Exile this artifact, Exile another artifact you control or an artifact card from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置至多一个目标神器或生物并在其上放置两个晕眩指示物。 以神器化炼{2}{U}（{2}{U}，放逐此神器，放逐另一个由你操控的神器或一张你坟墓场中的神器牌：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·62 | Guidestone Compass | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Guidestone Compass
trans-unit.target: 导石罗盘

trans-unit.resname: LCI·62 | Guidestone Compass | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：令目标由你操控的生物勘察。只能于法术时机起动。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·63 | Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel
trans-unit.target: 迷声恶棍马科姆

trans-unit.resname: LCI·63 | Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, put a chorus counter on it. Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are four or more chorus counters on Malcolm, you may cast the discarded card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，在其上放置一个合韵指示物。抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。如果马科姆上有四个或更多合韵指示物，则你可以施放所弃之牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·64 | Marauding Brinefang | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Marauding Brinefang
trans-unit.target: 劫掠海齿兽

trans-unit.resname: LCI·64 | Marauding Brinefang | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Ward {3} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)\nIslandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 守护{3}（每当此生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{3}，否则反击之。） 循环海岛{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你牌库中搜寻一张海岛牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·64 | Marauding Brinefang | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ancient glyphs are a lot harder to decipher when attached to an apex predator.
trans-unit.target: 当远古雕符出现在了顶级掠食者身上时，解读难度就大大增加。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·65 | Merfolk Cave-Diver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Merfolk Cave-Diver
trans-unit.target: 潜窟人鱼

trans-unit.resname: LCI·65 | Merfolk Cave-Diver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control explores, CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物勘查时，CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束，且本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·65 | Merfolk Cave-Diver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Learn all you can of this underground sea. I suspect more secrets of our ancestors lie waiting in its depths."\n—Tishana
trans-unit.target: 「尽你所能摸透这片地下海的底细。我怀疑其深处还有更多先祖的秘密等待我们去发现。」 ～提莎娜

trans-unit.resname: LCI·66 | Oaken Siren | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oaken Siren
trans-unit.target: 橡木塞连

trans-unit.resname: LCI·66 | Oaken Siren | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance\n{T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast an artifact spell or activate an ability of an artifact source.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒 {T}：加{U}。此法术力只能用来施放神器咒语或起动神器的异能。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·66 | Oaken Siren | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The ship's carpenter adorned the figurehead with a small cosmium gem, never expecting the figurehead to take flight.
trans-unit.target: 造船木匠不过是给船首像装上一枚宇金碎石作点缀，未曾想到这雕像就此飞空。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·67 | Ojer Pakpatiq, Deepest Epoch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ojer Pakpatiq, Deepest Epoch
trans-unit.target: 深邃纪时巴帕提尊神

trans-unit.resname: LCI·67 | Ojer Pakpatiq, Deepest Epoch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast an instant spell from your hand, it gains rebound. (Exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast it from exile without paying its mana cost.)\nWhen Ojer Pakpatiq dies, return it to the battlefield tapped and transformed under its owner's control with three time counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你从你手上施放瞬间咒语时，它获得弹回异能。（于它结算时将之放逐。在你的下一个维持开始时，你可以从放逐区施放它，且不需支付其法术力费用。） 当巴帕提尊神死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场，其为已横置、已转化且其上有三个计时指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·67 | Temple of Cyclical Time | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple of Cyclical Time
trans-unit.target: 环时殿堂

trans-unit.resname: LCI·67 | Temple of Cyclical Time | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Ojer Pakpatiq, Deepest Epoch.)\n{T}: Add {U}. Remove a time counter from CARDNAME.\n{2}{U}, {T}: Transform CARDNAME. Activate only if it has no time counters on it and only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: （由深邃纪时巴帕提尊神转化。） {T}：加{U}。从CARDNAME上移去一个计时指示物。 {2}{U}，{T}：转化CARDNAME。只能于其上没有计时指示物时起动，且仅限法术时机。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·67 | Temple of Cyclical Time | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Chimil gave the Oltec time. Ojer Pakpatiq gave them the tools to learn its lessons.
trans-unit.target: 奇密理令欧尔提克得观时间。巴帕提尊神教他们如何从中纪事。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·68 | Orazca Puzzle-Door | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orazca Puzzle-Door
trans-unit.target: 欧拉兹卡密门

trans-unit.resname: LCI·68 | Orazca Puzzle-Door | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·68 | Orazca Puzzle-Door | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Between Quintorius's archaeological expertise and Huatli's knowledge of ancient glyphs, the "impossible" lock finally yielded, and the door to the underground world rumbled open.
trans-unit.target: 在昆托力的考古专才与华特莉的古符知识携手攻关之下，终于解开了这道「不破密锁」，于是通往地底世界的大门就此隆隆开启。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·69 | Out of Air | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Out of Air
trans-unit.target: 气息不足

trans-unit.resname: LCI·69 | Out of Air | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature spell.\nCounter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语以生物咒语为目标，则它减少{2}来施放。 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·69 | Out of Air | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Core is not a simple trove to be plundered by intruders from the surface. It will reject those who do not accord it respect."\n—Akal Pakal, First Steward of Oteclan
trans-unit.target: 「世界核心并非是放任地上入侵者劫掠的普通宝库。任何未示敬意者都会被拒之门外。」 ～欧特克兰首席宰相阿卡帕卡

trans-unit.resname: LCI·70 | Pirate Hat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pirate Hat
trans-unit.target: 海盗帽

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, draw a card, then discard a card."\nEquip Pirate {1}\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

trans-unit.resname: LCI·70 | Pirate Hat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Landlubbers just don't understand the value of a proper hat."
trans-unit.target: 「旱鸭子根本不懂好帽子的价值。」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·71 | Relic's Roar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Relic's Roar
trans-unit.target: 遗宝呼吼

trans-unit.resname: LCI·71 | Relic's Roar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target artifact or creature becomes a Dinosaur artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/3 in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标神器或生物成为基础力量与防御力为4/3的恐龙神器生物，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·71 | Relic's Roar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well, that's one less share to divide up."\n—Dranach, Dire Fleet boatswain
trans-unit.target: 「好，这下少一个分钱的。」 ～焦炬舰队水手长卓纳克

trans-unit.resname: LCI·72 | River Herald Scout | Card Name
trans-unit.source: River Herald Scout
trans-unit.target: 川流使斥候

trans-unit.resname: LCI·72 | River Herald Scout | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，令它勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·72 | River Herald Scout | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Don't worry, little swimmers. I'm here for the ruins, not you."
trans-unit.target: 「小鱼们，不用担心。我是为遗迹而来，无意伤害你们。」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·73 | Sage of Days | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sage of Days
trans-unit.target: 岁月智者

trans-unit.resname: LCI·73 | Sage of Days | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may put one of those cards back on top of your library. Put the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌。你可以将其中一张放回你的牌库顶。将其余的牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·73 | Sage of Days | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "After this age, another."
trans-unit.target: 「此纪过后，还有来纪。」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·74 | Self-Reflection | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 自省吾身

trans-unit.source: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.\nFlashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由你操控的生物之复制品。 返照{3}{U}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·74 | Self-Reflection | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some Echoes remember every moment of their past lives and spend their existence contemplating past choices.
trans-unit.target: 有些念世灵会记得前世的每个瞬间，于是便将眼下存在全部用来反思过往抉择。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·75 | Shipwreck Sentry | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 遇难船哨卫

trans-unit.resname: LCI·75 | Shipwreck Sentry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nAs long as an artifact entered the battlefield under your control this turn, CARDNAME can attack as though it didn't have defender.
trans-unit.target: 守军 只要本回合中有神器在你操控下进战场，CARDNAME便能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·75 | Shipwreck Sentry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "That's close enough, stranger."
trans-unit.target: 「陌生人，别再靠近了。」

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物或载具 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以磨两张牌。（你可以将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。） 落坟无边～所结附的生物得-X/-0，X为你坟墓场中的永久物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·79 | Staunch Crewmate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Leave you? Not a chance. You still owe me money."
trans-unit.target: 「丢下你？想得美。你还欠我钱呢。」

trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，反击至多一个目标起动式或触发式异能。如果以此法反击神器，生物或鹏洛客的异能，则于CARDNAME仍在战场上的时段内，该永久物失去所有异能。（其目标不能是法术力异能。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·82 | Unlucky Drop | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "First rule down here is the same as it is on the water: always double-check your knots."\n—Captain Lannery Storm

trans-unit.resname: LCI·85 | Waylaying Pirates | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices two creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各牺牲两个生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·87 | Abyssal Gorestalker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Its kin once overran entire civilizations, but they tore each other to pieces in their unending hunger. Now only it remains.
trans-unit.target: 它的同族扫平了一切文明，却仍未能满足无尽饕欲而彼此相食。如今只剩它一个留存于世。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·88 | Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal | Card Name

trans-unit.source:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever Aclazotz attacks, each opponent discards a card. For each opponent who can't, you draw a card.
Whenever an opponent discards a land card, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.
When Aclazotz dies, return it to the battlefield tapped and transformed under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命 每当阿洛佐兹攻击时，每位对手各弃一张牌。每有一位无法如此作的对手，你便抓一张牌。 每当任一对手弃一张地牌时，你派出一个1/1黑色，具飞行异能的蝙蝠衍生生物。 当阿洛佐兹死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下横置移回战场且已转化。
