trans-unit.target: （由深邃叛神阿洛佐兹转化。） {T}：加{B}。 {2}{B}，{T}：转化CARDNAME。只能于某牌手的手牌为一张或更少时起动，且仅限法术时机。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·88 | Temple of the Dead | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Chimil gave the Oltec peace in death. Aclazotz ripped it away.
trans-unit.target: 奇密理赋欧尔提克逝后安眠。阿洛佐兹将这一切剥夺殆尽。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·89 | Acolyte of Aclazotz | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Acolyte of Aclazotz
trans-unit.target: 阿洛佐兹侍僧

trans-unit.resname: LCI·89 | Acolyte of Aclazotz | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物或神器：每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·89 | Acolyte of Aclazotz | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Great Aclazotz, receive this offering. Wrought with skill. Captured with strength. Anointed with the blood of your enemies."
trans-unit.target: 「阿洛佐兹在上，请收下此物。巧匠技艺铸造，无匹实力夺获，蒙你仇敌鲜血洗礼。」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·90 | Another Chance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Another Chance
trans-unit.target: 再获良机

trans-unit.resname: LCI·90 | Another Chance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may mill two cards. Then return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill two cards, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以磨两张牌。然后将至多两张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。（磨两张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·90 | Another Chance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The pull of duty was so strong that they barely paused to notice they'd died.
trans-unit.target: 职责的呼唤是如此强烈，他们甚至都没闲暇来注意自己是否还在喘气。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·91 | Bitter Triumph | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bitter Triumph
trans-unit.target: 惨痛胜利

trans-unit.resname: LCI·91 | Bitter Triumph | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card or pay 3 life.\nDestroy target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 弃一张牌或支付3点生命，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·91 | Bitter Triumph | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though he wept at Inti's death, Caparocti's eyes were keen, and his spear pierced cleanly through Clavileño's tainted heart.
trans-unit.target: 虽然卡帕罗提内心仍由于因缇战殁而悲伤不已，但是其仍眼疾手快抓住机会，一枪刺穿了克莱维诺那颗堕落之心。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·92 | Bloodletter of Aclazotz | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodletter of Aclazotz
trans-unit.target: 阿洛佐兹放血魔

trans-unit.resname: LCI·92 | Bloodletter of Aclazotz | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nIf an opponent would lose life during your turn, they lose twice that much life instead. (Damage causes loss of life.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 如果某对手将于你的回合中失去生命，则改为其失去两倍于该数量的生命。（伤害会导致失去生命。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·92 | Bloodletter of Aclazotz | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Its very presence rips old wounds open to bleed anew.
trans-unit.target: 它甫一现身，旧伤开裂，鲜血涌出。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·93 | Bloodthorn Flail | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodthorn Flail
trans-unit.target: 血棘连枷

trans-unit.resname: LCI·93 | Bloodthorn Flail | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+1.\nEquip—\nPay {3} or discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+1。 佩带～支付{3}或弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·93 | Bloodthorn Flail | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This weapon embodies both the strength and the weakness of the Legion of Dusk. They will endure any pain to achieve their ends, but they suffer pointlessly just to prove their dedication."\n—Huatli
trans-unit.target: 「这件武器优缺点分明，正如暮影军团本身。他们为达目的甘愿忍受一切苦痛，但却只是为自证虔诚而无端遭难。」 ～华特莉

trans-unit.resname: LCI·94 | Bringer of the Last Gift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bringer of the Last Gift
trans-unit.target: 终礼使者

trans-unit.resname: LCI·94 | Bringer of the Last Gift | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it, each player sacrifices all other creatures they control. Then each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard that weren't put there this way to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它经你施放，则每位牌手各牺牲所有由其操控的其他生物。然后每位牌手各从其坟墓场中将所有并非以此法进入该处的生物牌移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·95 | Broodrage Mycoid | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Broodrage Mycoid
trans-unit.target: 巢怒智蕈

trans-unit.resname: LCI·95 | Broodrage Mycoid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, create a 1/1 black Fungus creature token with "This creature can't block." (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中有落坟，则派出一个1/1黑色真菌衍生生物，且具有「此生物不能进行阻挡。」（如果有永久物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，便算作你有落坟。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·95 | Broodrage Mycoid | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the massive mycoids known as rage titans charge into battle, lesser ones swarm in their wake, gobbling up any survivors.
trans-unit.target: 名唤怒火泰坦的巨型智蕈率先冲入战场，之后体型较小的智蕈紧随其后，伺机吞噬侥幸存活者。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·96 | Canonized in Blood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Canonized in Blood
trans-unit.target: 鲜血封圣

trans-unit.resname: LCI·96 | Canonized in Blood | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)\n{5}{B}{B}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Create a 4/3 white and black Vampire Demon creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中有落坟，则在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（如果有永久物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，便算作你有落坟。） {5}{B}{B}，牺牲CARDNAME：派出一个4/3，白黑双色，具飞行异能的吸血鬼／恶魔衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·97 | Chupacabra Echo | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chupacabra Echo
trans-unit.target: 念世卓柏卡布拉

trans-unit.resname: LCI·97 | Chupacabra Echo | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fathomless descent — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of permanent cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 落坟无边～当CARDNAME进战场时，目标由对手操控的生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为你坟墓场中的永久物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·97 | Chupacabra Echo | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It needs no food, yet still it hungers.
trans-unit.target: 它虽不需进食，但仍饥渴依旧。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·98 | Corpses of the Lost | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Corpses of the Lost
trans-unit.target: 失落者之骸

trans-unit.resname: LCI·98 | Corpses of the Lost | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Skeletons you control get +1/+0 and have haste.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Skeleton Pirate creature token.\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, you may pay 1 life. If you do, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的骷髅妖得+1/+0且具有敏捷异能。 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个2/2黑色骷髅妖／海盗衍生生物。 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中有落坟，则你可以支付1点生命。若你如此作，则将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。（如果有永久物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，便算作你有落坟。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·99 | Dead Weight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dead Weight
trans-unit.target: 重负

trans-unit.resname: LCI·99 | Dead Weight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -2/-2.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得-2/-2。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·99 | Dead Weight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The hired goblins were not, as advertised, worth their weight in gold.
trans-unit.target: 雇来的鬼怪并不像他们吹嘘的那样，值得搭上等重的金子。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·100 | Deathcap Marionette | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deathcap Marionette
trans-unit.target: 毒蕈菇偶

trans-unit.resname: LCI·100 | Deathcap Marionette | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may mill two cards. (You may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以磨两张牌。（你可以将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·100 | Deathcap Marionette | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mycoids have no concept of life or death. All things exist, and all things can be made useful.
trans-unit.target: 智蕈没有生死的概念。所有东西既存于世，便都能派上用场。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·101 | Deep Goblin Skulltaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deep Goblin Skulltaker
trans-unit.target: 深邃夺骨鬼怪

trans-unit.resname: LCI·101 | Deep Goblin Skulltaker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)
trans-unit.target: 威慑 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中有落坟，则在深CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（如果有永久物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，便算作你有落坟。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·101 | Deep Goblin Skulltaker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Go away! I found it first!"
trans-unit.target: 「走开！我先发现的！」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·102 | Deep-Cavern Bat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deep-Cavern Bat
trans-unit.target: 深窟蝙蝠

trans-unit.resname: LCI·102 | Deep-Cavern Bat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视目标对手的手牌。你可以放逐其中一张非地牌，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·102 | Deep-Cavern Bat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The first shriek locates the prey. The second immobilizes it.
trans-unit.target: 第一声尖啸找到猎物。第二声令其动弹不得。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·103 | Defossilize | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Defossilize
trans-unit.target: 化石复生

trans-unit.resname: LCI·103 | Defossilize | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature explores, then it explores again. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard. Then repeat this process.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。令该生物勘察，然后再勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。然后重复此流程。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·104 | Echo of Dusk | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Echo of Dusk
trans-unit.target: 暮影念世灵

trans-unit.resname: LCI·104 | Echo of Dusk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Descend 4 — As long as there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard, CARDNAME gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 落坟4～只要你坟墓场中有四张或更多永久物牌，CARDNAME便得+1/+1且具有系命异能。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·104 | Echo of Dusk | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's a mournful fate, to remember so well the taste of blood yet be forever unable to drink."\n—Bartolomé del Presidio, director of the Queen's Bay Company
trans-unit.target: 「此般命运是如此悲哀，虽能清楚记得鲜血滋味，却再也无法亲口品尝。」 ～女王湾连队总督巴洛梅德普西迪奥

trans-unit.resname: LCI·105 | Fanatical Offering | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fanatical Offering
trans-unit.target: 狂热献祭

trans-unit.resname: LCI·105 | Fanatical Offering | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.\nDraw two cards and create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器或生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 抓两张牌并派出一个地图衍生物。（它是具有「{1}，{T}，牺牲此神器：令目标由你操控的生物勘察。只能于法术时机起动」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·105 | Fanatical Offering | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The gateway could be opened only by the spilling of innocent blood. Vito did not hesitate.
trans-unit.target: 闸门只有洒上无辜之血后才能打开。维托没有半点犹豫。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·106 | Fungal Fortitude | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fungal Fortitude
trans-unit.target: 聚菌之勇

trans-unit.resname: LCI·106 | Fungal Fortitude | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+0。 当所结附的生物死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·107 | Gargantuan Leech | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gargantuan Leech
trans-unit.target: 庞巨蛭

trans-unit.resname: LCI·107 | Gargantuan Leech | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Cave you control and each Cave card in your graveyard.\nLifelink
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个洞窟或你坟墓场中每有一张洞窟牌，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。 系命

trans-unit.resname: LCI·107 | Gargantuan Leech | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Does *everything* down here want to suck my blood?"\n—Derilene, expedition porter
trans-unit.target: 「难道这地底下每一个东西都想吸我的血吗？」 ～探险队脚夫德利涅

trans-unit.resname: LCI·108 | Grasping Shadows | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grasping Shadows
trans-unit.target: 缠攫阴影

trans-unit.resname: LCI·108 | Grasping Shadows | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn. Put a dread counter on CARDNAME. Then if there are three or more dread counters on it, transform it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，它获得死触与系命异能直到回合结束。在CARDNAME上放置一个怖惧指示物。然后若其上有三个或更多恐惧指示物，则转化它。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·108 | Shadows' Lair | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shadows' Lair
trans-unit.target: 阴影巢穴

trans-unit.resname: LCI·108 | Shadows' Lair | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Grasping Shadows.)\n{T}: Add {B}.\n{B}, {T}, Remove a dread counter from CARDNAME: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: （由缠攫阴影转化。） {T}：加{B}。 {B}，{T}，从紧攫阴影上移去一个怖惧指示物：你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·108 | Shadows' Lair | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The shadows make no mark upon the flesh. It is the mind they claw and strangle.
trans-unit.target: 此等阴影从不在肉身留痕，只会抓住心灵紧紧纠缠。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·109 | Greedy Freebooter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Greedy Freebooter
trans-unit.target: 贪婪掠盗

trans-unit.resname: LCI·109 | Greedy Freebooter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, scry 1 and create a Treasure token. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom. A Treasure token is an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，占卜1并派出一个珍宝衍生物。（占卜1的流程是检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·109 | Greedy Freebooter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Neither Nurgam nor the mycoid who laid the trap could quite believe their luck.
trans-unit.target: 努甘和设陷的智蕈都不敢相信自己会有如此好运。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·110 | Join the Dead | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Join the Dead
trans-unit.target: 亡灵征列

trans-unit.resname: LCI·110 | Join the Dead | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.\nDescend 4 — That creature gets -10/-10 until end of turn instead if there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-5/-5直到回合结束。 落坟4～如果你坟墓场中有四张或更多永久物牌，则改为该生物得-10/-10直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·110 | Join the Dead | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The more creatures that plunge to their deaths in the abyss, the more angry Echoes that arise to drag others down.
trans-unit.target: 落入深渊不幸堕亡的生灵越多，起身复返拖人入列的念世灵也越多。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·111 | Malicious Eclipse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Malicious Eclipse
trans-unit.target: 恶意蔽日

trans-unit.resname: LCI·111 | Malicious Eclipse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If a creature an opponent controls would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。如果本回合中由对手操控的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·111 | Malicious Eclipse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Aclazotz laughed as the dark shards closed around Chimil, plunging the Core into unnatural darkness. At long last, his bloody reign would begin.
trans-unit.target: 随着黑暗碎片逐渐遮蔽奇密理，令世界核心陷入异状黑暗，阿洛佐兹不由畅怀大笑。历经艰辛，他的血腥统治终能揭开帷幕。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·112 | Mephitic Draught | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mephitic Draught
trans-unit.target: 恶毒药剂

trans-unit.resname: LCI·112 | Mephitic Draught | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场或从战场进入坟墓场时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·112 | Mephitic Draught | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Don't look at me. I'm not drinking it."\n—Dranach, Dire Fleet boatswain
trans-unit.target: 「别看我，我可不喝。」 ～焦炬舰队水手长卓纳克

trans-unit.resname: LCI·113 | Preacher of the Schism | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Preacher of the Schism
trans-unit.target: 叛教帮传道士

trans-unit.resname: LCI·113 | Preacher of the Schism | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks while you have the most life or are tied for most life, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 死触 每当CARDNAME攻击总生命最高或与他者同为最高的牌手时，派出一个1/1白色，具系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物。 每当CARDNAME于你是总生命最高或与他者同为最高的牌手时攻击，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·114 | Primordial Gnawer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Primordial Gnawer
trans-unit.target: 原初啮骨虫

trans-unit.resname: LCI·114 | Primordial Gnawer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, discover 3. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，倾探3。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于3的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·114 | Primordial Gnawer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Cave crawlers devour anything from plant matter to solid rock, but they prefer fresh meat.
trans-unit.target: 虽然洞窟爬虫万物皆能食，植物岩石全不忌，但它们还是更喜欢鲜肉。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·115 | Queen's Bay Paladin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Queen's Bay Paladin
trans-unit.target: 女王湾神圣武士

trans-unit.resname: LCI·115 | Queen's Bay Paladin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, return up to one target Vampire card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. You lose life equal to its mana value. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，将至多一张目标吸血鬼牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且上面有一个终命指示物。你失去等同于其法术力值的生命。（如果其上有终命指示物的生物将死去，则改为放逐之。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·116 | Rampaging Spiketail | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rampaging Spiketail
trans-unit.target: 莽闯刺尾龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·116 | Rampaging Spiketail | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn.\nSwampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，直到回合结束，目标由你操控的生物得+2/+0且获得不灭异能。 循环沼泽{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你牌库中搜寻一张沼泽牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·117 | Ray of Ruin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ray of Ruin
trans-unit.target: 毁坏射线

trans-unit.resname: LCI·117 | Ray of Ruin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature, Vehicle, or nonbasic land. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物，载具或非基本地。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·117 | Ray of Ruin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We know Chimil's light as a warming, healing presence, but make no mistake: to those who would desecrate her lands, it is a terrible force of scouring fury."\n—Akal Pakal, First Steward of Oteclan
trans-unit.target: 「虽然奇密理的光芒温暖怡人，但并非万物都作此感受：对那些胆敢亵渎她土地的生灵来说，这光芒便是展现灼热怒火的可怖力量。」 ～欧特克兰首席宰相阿卡帕卡

trans-unit.resname: LCI·118 | Screaming Phantom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Screaming Phantom
trans-unit.target: 尖鸣幽魅

trans-unit.resname: LCI·118 | Screaming Phantom | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, mill a card. (Put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，磨一张牌。（将你牌库顶的一张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·118 | Screaming Phantom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After a slow death in darkness, she flies into a rage at the slightest glimpse of light.
trans-unit.target: 由于她是在黑暗中受困而死，因此一见点滴亮光便会勃然大怒。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·119 | Skullcap Snail | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skullcap Snail
trans-unit.target: 头骨蜗牛

trans-unit.resname: LCI·119 | Skullcap Snail | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent exiles a card from their hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手从其手上放逐一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·119 | Skullcap Snail | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Oh, come on! Aren't regular snails gross enough?"\n—Derilene, expedition porter
trans-unit.target: 「得了吧！普通的蜗牛还不够恶心吗？」 ～探险队脚夫德利涅

trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且上面有一个终命指示物。只能于法术时机起动。（如果其上有终命指示物的生物将死去，则改为放逐之。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·120 | Soulcoil Viper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As the snake sheds its skin to be born anew, we cast off death to rise as servants of Aclazotz."\n—Vito, Church of Dusk heretic
trans-unit.target: 「正如蛇褪去皮肤方能获得新生，吾人直面死亡才有幸随侍阿洛佐兹。」 ～暮影教异端维托

trans-unit.resname: LCI·121 | Souls of the Lost | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 失落者灵魂

trans-unit.resname: LCI·121 | Souls of the Lost | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card or sacrifice a permanent.\nFathomless descent — CARDNAME's power is equal to the number of permanent cards in your graveyard and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
trans-unit.target: 弃一张牌或牺牲一个永久物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 落坟无边～CARDNAME的力量等同于你坟墓场中的永久物牌数量，其防御力等同于该数量加1。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·121 | Souls of the Lost | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Do you remember us?"
trans-unit.target: 「还记得我们吗？」

trans-unit.source: Menace\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)\n{2}{B}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is CARDNAME's power.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中有落坟，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（如果有永久物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，便算作你有落坟。） {2}{B}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为CARDNAME的力量。

trans-unit.target: 饥饿复灵

trans-unit.resname: LCI·123 | Starving Revenant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, surveil 2. Then for each card you put on top of your library, you draw a card and you lose 3 life.\nDescend 8 — Whenever you draw a card, if there are eight or more permanent cards in your graveyard, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，刺探2。然后你每将一张牌置于你的牌库顶，便抓一张牌且失去3点生命。 落坟8～每当你抓一张牌时，若你坟墓场中有八张或更多永久物牌，则目标对手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·124 | Stinging Cave Crawler | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 没有智蕈的洞窟里面，往往住着其他更恐怖的东西。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·125 | Synapse Necromage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's no good killing them? Then what do we do? Distract them with a tea party?"\n—Mervin, Brazen Coalition prospector

trans-unit.resname: LCI·126 | Tarrian's Journal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though officially deemed a heretic for his reverent writings on Aclazotz, Tarrian is viewed as a holy martyr by the most radical sects of the Church of Dusk.

trans-unit.resname: LCI·132 | Ancestors' Aid | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them this turn. If you exiled a land card this way, create a 3/1 red Dinosaur creature token. If you exiled a nonland card this way, create a Treasure token.

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards plus one.\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, put a bore counter on CARDNAME. Then if there are three or more bore counters on it, remove those counters and transform it. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)

trans-unit.target: （由霸司的掘隧机转化。） {T}：加{R}。 每当你利用CARDNAME产生之法术力来施放永久物咒语时，倾探X，X为该咒语的法术力值。

trans-unit.source: "Whatever it is, it set off a trap. It must be valuable!"
trans-unit.target: 「不管是什么，它触发了机关。一定很值钱！」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·161 | Poetic Ingenuity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Poetic Ingenuity
trans-unit.target: 诗情巧意

trans-unit.resname: LCI·161 | Poetic Ingenuity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Dinosaurs you control attack, create that many Treasure tokens.\nWhenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 3/1 red Dinosaur creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个恐龙攻击时，派出等量的珍宝衍生物。 每当你施放神器咒语时，派出一个3/1红色恐龙衍生生物。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·161 | Poetic Ingenuity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You inspire me."
trans-unit.target: 「你启发了我。」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·162 | Rampaging Ceratops | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rampaging Ceratops
trans-unit.target: 莽闯犄角龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·162 | Rampaging Ceratops | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能被三个或更多生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·162 | Rampaging Ceratops | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Anticipating tight spaces and trivial fauna, the first Dusk Legion expeditions were small, mobile, and lightly armored. Hundreds of casualties later, they started sending plate-clad platoons.
trans-unit.target: 最初一批深入地底的暮影军团探险队以为洞窟里面地形狭窄、动物稀少，因此便散作灵活机动的小规模团队轻装出阵。在减员高达数百人之后，他们才开始派出装甲部队。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·163 | Rumbling Rockslide | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rumbling Rockslide
trans-unit.target: 隆响石流

trans-unit.resname: LCI·163 | Rumbling Rockslide | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的地数量。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·163 | Rumbling Rockslide | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes an expedition reaches a natural conclusion. Sometimes it all just comes crashing down.
trans-unit.target: 有时探险会自然结束。有时探险则会突然结束。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·164 | Saheeli's Lattice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Saheeli's Lattice
trans-unit.target: 莎希莉的格栅

trans-unit.resname: LCI·164 | Saheeli's Lattice | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.\nCraft with one or more Dinosaurs {4}{R} ({4}{R}, Exile this artifact, Exile one or more Dinosaurs you control and/or Dinosaur cards from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓两张牌。 以一个或更多恐龙化炼{4}{R}（{4}{R}，放逐此神器，从由你操控的恐龙和／或你坟墓场中的恐龙牌中放逐前述物件达一个或更多：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·164 | Mastercraft Raptor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mastercraft Raptor
trans-unit.target: 巧艺迅猛龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·164 | Mastercraft Raptor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power is equal to the total power of the exiled cards used to craft it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量等同于用以化炼它所放逐之牌的力量总和。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·164 | Mastercraft Raptor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: While Huatli ventured underground, Saheeli used her unique expertise to bolster the Sun Empire's defenses.
trans-unit.target: 当华特莉深入地底时，莎希莉利用她的独门手艺来巩固烈阳帝国的防线。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·165 | Scytheclaw Raptor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scytheclaw Raptor
trans-unit.target: 镰爪迅猛龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·165 | Scytheclaw Raptor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a spell, if it's not their turn, CARDNAME deals 4 damage to them.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放咒语时，若当前不是该牌手的回合，则CARDNAME对其造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·165 | Scytheclaw Raptor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "She's a smart one. Noticed all on her own that the bloodsuckers wave their hands around to do their filthy magic, so she rips off their hands first."\n—Citamitzin, Sun Empire warrior
trans-unit.target: 「她很聪明。在意识到那群吸血鬼手上要有动作才能施展肮脏魔法之后，她就抢先把他们的手都扯了下来。」 ～烈阳帝国战士希坦钦

trans-unit.resname: LCI·166 | Seismic Monstrosaur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seismic Monstrosaur
trans-unit.target: 震地蛮巨龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·166 | Seismic Monstrosaur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\n{2}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card.\nMountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏 {2}{R}，牺牲一个地：抓一张牌。 循环山脉{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你牌库中搜寻一张山脉牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·167 | Sunfire Torch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunfire Torch
trans-unit.target: 阳焰炬

trans-unit.resname: LCI·167 | Sunfire Torch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice CARDNAME. When you do, this creature deals 2 damage to any target."\nEquip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+1/+0且具有「每当此生物攻击时，你可以牺牲CARDNAME。当你如此作时，此生物对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。」 佩带{1}（{1}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·167 | Sunfire Torch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let Tilonalli's light burn a path through this darkness."
trans-unit.target: 「让蒂洛纳理的光芒在黑暗中烧出一条通路。」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·168 | Sunshot Militia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunshot Militia
trans-unit.target: 阳击民兵

trans-unit.resname: LCI·168 | Sunshot Militia | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap two untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 横置两个由你操控且未横置的神器和／或生物：CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·168 | Sunshot Militia | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the Legion of Dusk closed in, Oltec citizens rallied to support the Thousand Moons and drive off the invaders.
trans-unit.target: 随着暮影军团逐渐逼近，欧尔特克市民自发集结起来支援千月军击退入侵者。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·169 | Tectonic Hazard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tectonic Hazard
trans-unit.target: 地壳灾害

trans-unit.resname: LCI·169 | Tectonic Hazard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature they control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME向每位对手和每个由对手操控的生物各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·169 | Tectonic Hazard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The ground is on fire, the ceiling's made of spears, and I think a mushroom tried to curse me. Don't tell me not to panic!"\n—Jino Grag, Brazen Coalition scout
trans-unit.target: 「地上着火，天上下矛，还有个蘑菇想要诅咒我。你让我怎么不慌张？」 ～莽霸联盟斥候基诺格拉格

trans-unit.resname: LCI·170 | Triumphant Chomp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Triumphant Chomp
trans-unit.target: 得胜撕咬

trans-unit.resname: LCI·170 | Triumphant Chomp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals damage to target creature equal to 2 or the greatest power among Dinosaurs you control, whichever is greater.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于2与「由你操控之恐龙中的最大力量」两者间较大者。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·170 | Triumphant Chomp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With crunchy outer shells and juicy innards, cave crawlers quickly became a favorite snack of the Sun Empire's dinosaur companions.
trans-unit.target: 洞窟爬虫外壳酥脆、内脏多汁，很快就成了烈阳帝国恐龙行伴的最爱点心。

trans-unit.target: 长吼食肉龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·171 | Trumpeting Carnosaur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, discover 5.\n{2}{R}, Discard CARDNAME: It deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，倾探5。 {2}{R}，弃掉CARDNAME：它对目标生物或鹏洛客造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·172 | Volatile Wanderglyph | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Volatile Wanderglyph
trans-unit.target: 易怒漫游符

trans-unit.resname: LCI·172 | Volatile Wanderglyph | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes tapped, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为横置时，你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·172 | Volatile Wanderglyph | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Touched eons ago by Ojer Axonil's flaming macuahuitl, it still burns with his boundless fury.
trans-unit.target: 万千之前它曾蒙安雄理尊神的火焰石锯剑触碰，如今它内里仍燃烧着无尽怒火。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·173 | Zoyowa's Justice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zoyowa's Justice
trans-unit.target: 佐佑瓦平异

trans-unit.resname: LCI·173 | Zoyowa's Justice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The owner of target artifact or creature with mana value 1 or greater shuffles it into their library. Then that player discovers X, where X is its mana value. (They exile cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. They cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into their hand. They put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 目标法术力值等于或大于1之神器或生物的拥有者将它洗入其牌库。然后该牌手倾探X，X为其法术力值。（该牌手从其的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。其施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于手上，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·174 | Armored Kincaller | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Armored Kincaller
trans-unit.target: 装甲唤族龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·174 | Armored Kincaller | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand. If you do or if you control another Dinosaur, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从手上展示一张恐龙牌。若你如此作或你操控另一个恐龙，则你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·174 | Armored Kincaller | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "She's devoted to protecting her herd. We're just lucky she considers us part of it."\n—Huatli
trans-unit.target: 「她会全心尽力地保护自己的族群。能被她视作自己人，我们实属荣幸。」 ～华特莉

trans-unit.resname: LCI·175 | Basking Capybara | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Basking Capybara
trans-unit.target: 沐日水豚

trans-unit.resname: LCI·175 | Basking Capybara | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Descend 4 — CARDNAME gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 落坟4～只要你坟墓场中有四张或更多永久物牌，CARDNAME便得+3/+0。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·175 | Basking Capybara | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Even our most learned philosophers can only hope to approach the inner serenity of the humble capybara."\n—Nelli, Oltec didact
trans-unit.target: 「就连我们知识最渊博的哲学家，也只能希冀自己终能达到水豚一般的平静境界。」 ～欧尔特克布道人奈莉

trans-unit.resname: LCI·176 | Bedrock Tortoise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bedrock Tortoise
trans-unit.target: 基岩驮龟

trans-unit.resname: LCI·176 | Bedrock Tortoise | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control have hexproof.\nEach creature you control with toughness greater than its power assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
trans-unit.target: 只要是在你的回合中，由你操控的生物便具有辟邪异能。 每个由你操控且防御力比力量大的生物皆依照其防御力来分配战斗伤害，而不是依照力量。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·176 | Bedrock Tortoise | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Many temples have strong foundations. Few are also wise.
trans-unit.target: 许多殿堂都有坚实的根基。少数根基还充满智慧。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·177 | Cavern Stomper | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 洞窟跺地龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·177 | Cavern Stomper | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)\n{3}{G}: CARDNAME can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。） {3}{G}：CARDNAME本回合不能被力量等于或小于2的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·178 | Cenote Scout | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 岩洞井斥候

trans-unit.resname: LCI·178 | Cenote Scout | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，令它勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·178 | Cenote Scout | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If you're afraid to dive into the unknown, how will you ever find anything new?"
trans-unit.target: 「你若是害怕潜入未知之境，又岂能发现新鲜事物？」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·179 | Coati Scavenger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coati Scavenger
trans-unit.target: 食腐浣熊

trans-unit.resname: LCI·179 | Coati Scavenger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Descend 4 — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 落坟4～当CARDNAME进战场时，若你坟墓场中有四张或更多永久物牌，则将目标永久物牌移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·179 | Coati Scavenger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The difference between trash and treasure is a matter of perspective.
trans-unit.target: 废物和宝物之间，不过是观点差异。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·180 | Colossadactyl | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Colossadactyl
trans-unit.target: 庞硕翼指龙

trans-unit.resname: LCI·180 | Colossadactyl | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reach, trample
trans-unit.target: 延势，践踏

trans-unit.resname: LCI·180 | Colossadactyl | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Accustomed to hunting nimble flying prey, the dinosaur was delighted to have its meal delivered neatly in a box.
trans-unit.target: 这恐龙虽早已惯于猎捕动作灵巧的飞行猎物，但有整盒装好喂到嘴边的食物，它也很乐于享用。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·181 | Cosmium Confluence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cosmium Confluence
trans-unit.target: 宇金交汇

trans-unit.resname: LCI·181 | Cosmium Confluence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Search your library for a Cave card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
• Put three +1/+1 counters on a Cave you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.
• Destroy target enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 选择三项。你可以多次选择同一项。 •从你牌库中搜寻一张洞窟牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。 •在一个由你操控的洞窟上放置三个+1/+1指示物。它成为0/0，具敏捷异能的元素生物。它仍然是地。 •消灭目标结界。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·182 | Disturbed Slumber | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disturbed Slumber
trans-unit.target: 遭扰沉眠

trans-unit.resname: LCI·182 | Disturbed Slumber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target land you control becomes a 4/4 Dinosaur creature with reach and haste. It's still a land. It must be blocked this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标由你操控的地成为4/4，具延势与敏捷异能的恐龙生物。它仍然是地。它本回合若能被阻挡，则须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·182 | Disturbed Slumber | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I'm telling you, the wall just blinked!"
trans-unit.target: 「我就跟你说，那堵墙刚刚眨了下眼！」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·183 | Earthshaker Dreadmaw | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Earthshaker Dreadmaw

trans-unit.resname: LCI·183 | Earthshaker Dreadmaw | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card for each other Dinosaur you control.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，你每操控一个其他恐龙，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·183 | Earthshaker Dreadmaw | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I suggest we leave this cavern for someone else to conquer."\n—Amalia, master cartographer
trans-unit.target: 「我提议让其他人来征服这洞窟。」 ～制图大师阿玛利亚

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。 每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 {T}：将一个+1/+1指示物从CARDNAME移到目标生物上。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·185 | Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A thundering roar calls forth a primeval army.
trans-unit.target: 雷霆怒吼引来太古大军。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·186 | Glimpse the Core | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glimpse the Core
trans-unit.target: 瞥视核心

trans-unit.resname: LCI·186 | Glimpse the Core | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Search your library for a basic Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.\n• Return target Cave card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的树林牌，将该牌横置放进战场，然后洗牌。 •将目标洞窟牌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.source: "Wow. It's a good thing we brought a poet."\n—Wayta

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures, transform CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: LCI·188 | Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though the Sun Empire and the River Heralds once came together to plant the sacred forest, its roots have been tended by the mycoids ever since.
trans-unit.target: 虽然起初这片圣洁丛林是由烈阳帝国与川流使联手栽下，但自此之后，其繁密根系便是一直是由智蕈悉心照管。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·189 | Huatli, Poet of Unity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.\n{3}{R/W}{R/W}: Exile Huatli, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.

trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)
I — Create two 3/3 green Dinosaur creature tokens.
II — CARDNAME gains "Creatures you control have '{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.'"
III — Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
IV — Dinosaurs you control gain double strike and trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到IV后牺牲之。） I — 派出两个3/3绿色恐龙衍生生物。 II — CARDNAME获得「由你操控的生物具有『{T}：加{R}，{G}或{W}。』」 III — 从你牌库中搜寻一张恐龙牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。 IV — 由你操控的恐龙获得连击与践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

trans-unit.resname: LCI·190 | Huatli's Final Strike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Inti's name will grace our poems and histories for generations. Yours will collect dust, forgotten, in this cave."\n—Huatli, to Vito
trans-unit.target: 「因缇之名将随我们的诗歌与史诗传扬万代。而你的名字将在这洞窟里落寞蒙灰、遭人遗忘。」 ～华特莉怒斥维托

trans-unit.resname: LCI·191 | Hulking Raptor | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white and blue Golem artifact creature token.\nCraft with artifact {4}{W}{W}{U} ({4}{W}{W}{U}, Exile this artifact, Exile another artifact you control or an artifact card from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个4/4，白蓝双色的魔像衍生神器生物。 以神器化炼{4}{W}{W}{U}（{4}{W}{W}{U}，放逐另一个由你操控的神器或一张你坟墓场中的神器牌：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.source: {T}: Create a 4/4 white and blue Golem artifact creature token. Activate only if CARDNAME or another artifact entered the battlefield under your control this turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：派出一个4/4，白蓝双色的魔像衍生神器生物。只能于CARDNAME或另一个神器在你操控下进战场的回合中起动。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·233 | Master's Manufactory | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Fomori are a foul and distant memory, but their war machines taught us much about large-scale armorcraft."\n—Anim Pakal, Thousandth Moon

trans-unit.source: Choose one. If you descended this turn, you may choose both instead. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)\n• Destroy target creature or planeswalker.\n• Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项。如果你本回合中有落坟，则你可以两项都选。（如果有永久物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，便算作你有落坟。） •消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。 •消灭目标非生物且非地的永久物，且其法术力值须等于或小于1。

trans-unit.target: 智蕈暴君

trans-unit.resname: LCI·235 | The Mycotyrant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control that are Fungi and/or Saprolings.\nAt the beginning of your end step, create X 1/1 black Fungus creature tokens with "This creature can't block," where X is the number of times you descended this turn. (You descend each time a permanent card is put into your graveyard from anywhere.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏 CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控且为真菌和／或孢子之生物的数量加总。 在每个结束步骤开始时，派出X个1/1黑色真菌衍生生物，且具有「此生物不能进行阻挡」，X为你本回合中的落坟次数。（每有一张永久物牌从任何区域进入坟墓场，便算落坟一次。）

trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物勘察到地牌时，你可以将一张地牌从你手上横置放进战场。 每当一个由你操控的生物勘察到非地牌时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "This water can guide you anywhere, if you know how to ask."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你晓得如何发问，水流便能指引你去往任何地方。」

trans-unit.resname: LCI·237 | Palani's Hatcher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other Dinosaurs you control have haste.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 green Dinosaur Egg creature tokens.\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control one or more Eggs, sacrifice an Egg, then create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他恐龙具有敏捷异能。 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个0/1绿色恐龙／蛋衍生生物。 在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控一个或数个蛋，则牺牲一个蛋，然后派出一个3/3绿色恐龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.source:
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.
+1: Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
−3: Discover 4.
−6: Exile any number of target cards from your graveyard. Add {R} for each card exiled this way. You may play those cards this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你从放逐区中施放咒语时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成2点伤害且你获得2点生命。 +1：派出一个3/2，红白双色的精怪衍生生物。 −3：倾探4。 −6：将任意数量目标牌从你的坟墓场放逐。每以此法放逐一张牌，便加{R}。本回合中，你可以使用这些牌。

trans-unit.target: {U}{R}，{T}：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为另一个目标由你操控的生物或神器之复制品，但它额外具有神器此类别。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时将它牺牲。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.\n{4}, {T}: Transform CARDNAME. Activate only if there are four or more permanent types among cards in your graveyard. (Artifact, battle, creature, enchantment, land, and planeswalker are permanent types.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 {4}，{T}：转化CARDNAME。只能于你坟墓场中牌的永久物类别有四种或更多时起动。（永久物的类别包括神器、战役、生物、结界、地以及鹏洛客。）

trans-unit.resname: LCI·256 | The Core | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Matzalantli.)\nFathomless descent — {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of permanent cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: （由通核伟门玛察栏蒂转化。） 落坟无边～{T}：加X点任意颜色的单色法术力，X为你坟墓场中的永久物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·256 | The Core | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Centuries ago, under siege from the Mycotyrant, the Oltec sealed the Core off from the world... until Huatli's party arrived.
trans-unit.target: 数百年前，由于遭到智蕈暴君的围攻，欧尔特克人被迫封闭世界核心与世隔绝…直到华特莉一行人来到这里为止。

trans-unit.resname: LCI·257 | The Millennium Calendar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Millennium Calendar
trans-unit.target: 千年历

trans-unit.resname: LCI·257 | The Millennium Calendar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you untap one or more permanents during your untap step, put that many time counters on CARDNAME.\n{2}, {T}: Double the number of time counters on CARDNAME.\nWhen there are 1,000 or more time counters on CARDNAME, sacrifice it and each opponent loses 1,000 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你于你的重置步骤中重置一个或数个永久物时，在CARDNAME上放置等量的计时指示物。 {2}，{T}：将CARDNAME上的计时指示物数量加倍。 当CARDNAME上有1000个或更多计时指示物时，将它牺牲且每位对手各失去1000点生命。

trans-unit.target: 游荡王座

trans-unit.source:
Ward {2}
As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
CARDNAME is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
If a triggered ability of another creature you control of the chosen type triggers, it triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 守护{2} 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 CARDNAME额外具有所选类别。 如果由你操控且为所选类别之其他生物的触发式异能触发，则它额外触发一次。

trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，它向目标由对手操控的生物造成6点伤害。 循环{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: "Run, hearties, run! Or we'll end our days as pirate paste!"

trans-unit.source: It knows the length, pitch, and orientation of every tunnel it has ever traversed.
trans-unit.target: 它熟知自己穿行过每一处隧道的长度、高度和方向。

trans-unit.source: Menace, trample, lifelink, hexproof\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, each opponent sacrifices a nonland permanent. Then you may put an exiled creature card used to craft CARDNAME onto the battlefield under your control tapped and attacking.
trans-unit.target: 威慑，践踏，系命，辟邪 每当CARDNAME攻击时，每位对手各牺牲一个非地永久物。然后你可以将一张用以化炼CARDNAME所放逐之生物牌在你操控下放进战场，其为横置且正进行攻击。

trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)
I — Create two 3/3 green Dinosaur creature tokens.
II — CARDNAME gains "Creatures you control have '{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.'"
III — Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到IV后牺牲之。） I — 派出两个3/3绿色恐龙衍生生物。 II — CARDNAME获得「由你操控的生物具有『{T}：加{R}，{G}或{W}。』」 III — 从你牌库中搜寻一张恐龙牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。 IV — 由你操控的恐龙获得连击与践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.\nWhenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, create a green Fungus Dinosaur creature token with base power and toughness each equal to the total power of those creatures.\n{2}, {T}: Double target creature's power until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语减少{X}来施放，X为由你操控之生物中的最大力量。 每当一个或数个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，派出一个绿色真菌／恐龙衍生生物，其基础力量和防御力各等同于死去生物之力量总和。 {2}，{T}：将目标生物的力量加倍直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，展示你的牌库顶牌。如果它是法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌，则将它置于你手上。若否，你可以将它置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.target: 先攻 你施放的恐龙咒语具有伺机{2}{R}。（如果你本回合中曾以与伺机咒语有共通生物类别的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害，则你可以支付该咒语的伺机费用来施放之。））

trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一个力量等于或大于4且非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，殖民。（派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: REX·5 | Life Finds a Way | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Life breaks free. It expands to new territories and crashes through barriers. Painfully, maybe even dangerously. But, uh, well there it is."\n—Ian Malcolm
trans-unit.target: 「生命会挣脱桎梏。它会扩展到新的领土，突破所有障碍。这个过程很辛苦，甚至会很危险。但是，呃，生命就是这样。」 ～伊恩·马科姆

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个力量等于或大于4的生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 从你牌库中搜寻一张恐龙生物牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。它获得不灭异能直到你的下一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: REX·6 | Savage Order | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well... it's a superpredator."\n—Billy Brennan
trans-unit.target: 「嗯…是超级掠食者。」 ～比利·布伦南

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Welcome to . . . | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Welcome to . . .
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到…

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Welcome to . . . | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — For each opponent, up to one target noncreature artifact they control becomes a 0/4 Wall artifact creature with defender for as long as you control this Saga.
II — Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample. It gains haste until end of turn.
III — Destroy all Walls. Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 为每位对手各选择至多一个目标由其操控且非生物的神器。于你操控此传纪的时段内，这些神器成为0/4具守军异能的墙神器生物。 II — 派出一个3/3绿色，具践踏异能的恐龙衍生生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。 III — 消灭所有墙。放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Jurassic Park | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 侏罗纪公园

trans-unit.resname: REX·7 | Jurassic Park | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Welcome to ....)\nEach Dinosaur card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast cards from your graveyard for their escape cost.)\n{T}: Add {G} for each Dinosaur you control.
trans-unit.target: （由欢迎来到…转化。） 你坟墓场中的每张恐龙牌均具有逸脱异能。其逸脱费用等同于该牌的法术力费用加上从你的坟墓场放逐三张其他牌。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放牌，并支付其逸脱费用。） {T}：你每操控一个恐龙，便加{G}。

trans-unit.source: Partner with Owen Grady, Raptor Trainer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Owen into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)\nFor each kind of counter on CARDNAME, each other Dinosaur you control enters the battlefield with a counter of that kind on it.
trans-unit.target: 与迅猛龙训练师欧文·格雷迪拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将欧文从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。） 每个由你操控的其他恐龙进战场时上面均有若干指示物，其种类与数量为「CARDNAME上的每种指示物各一个」。

trans-unit.resname: REX·9 | Compy Swarm | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Discover X, where X is the mana value of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，从你的坟墓场放逐一张生物牌：倾探X，X为所放逐之牌的法术力值。只能于法术时机起动。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

(If this creature isn't monstrous, put ten +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)\nWhen CARDNAME becomes monstrous, destroy all artifacts and creatures other than CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {10}{B}{G}：蛮化10。对手每操控一个力量等于或大于4的生物，此异能便减少{1}来起动。（如果此生物未蛮化，则在其上放置十个+1/+1指示物且它已蛮化。） 当CARDNAME蛮化时，消灭CARDNAME以外的所有神器和生物。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME and other Human creatures you control have exploit. (When a creature with exploit enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)\nWhenever a creature you control exploits a non-Human creature, draw a card. If the exploited creature had power 3 or greater, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME和由你操控的其他人类生物具有榨取异能。（当具榨取异能的生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。） 每当一个由你操控的生物榨取一个非人类生物时，抓一张牌。如果所榨取的生物力量等于或大于3，则派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ian Malcolm, Chaotician
trans-unit.target: 混沌学家伊恩·马科姆

trans-unit.resname: REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player draws their second card each turn, that player exiles the top card of their library.\nDuring each player's turn, that player may cast a spell from among the cards they don't own exiled with CARDNAME, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手抓每回合中其第二张牌时，该牌手放逐其牌库顶牌。 于每位牌手的回合中，该牌手可以从以CARDNAME放逐、且不由其拥有的牌之中施放一个咒语，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放之。

trans-unit.resname: REX·13 | Ian Malcolm, Chaotician | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You've heard of chaos theory?"
trans-unit.target: 「你们听过混沌理论吗？」

trans-unit.resname: REX·14 | Indominus Rex, Alpha | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, discard any number of creature cards. It enters with a flying counter on it if a card discarded this way has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, haste, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.\nWhen Indominus Rex enters the battlefield, draw a card for each counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，弃任意数量的生物牌。如果某张以此法弃掉的牌具有飞行异能，则它进战场时上面有一个飞行指示物。且先攻、连击、死触、辟邪、敏捷、不灭、系命、威慑、延势、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。 当暴虐霸王龙进战场时，其上每有一个指示物，便抓一张牌。

Indoraptor deals damage equal to its power to that player unless they sacrifice a nontoken creature.
trans-unit.target: 嗜血X（此生物进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为对手本回合受过的伤害数量。） 威慑 激怒～每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，随机选择一位对手。除非该牌手牺牲一个非衍生物的生物，否则暴虐迅猛龙对该牌手造成等同于其力量的伤害。

trans-unit.target: 与忠诚迅猛龙布鲁拍档 {T}：在目标恐龙上依你的选择放置一个威慑，践踏，延势或敏捷指示物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: REX·17 | Permission Denied | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell. Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells this turn.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。所有对手本回合都不能施放非生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: REX·17 | Permission Denied | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ah, ah, ah! You didn't say the magic word."
trans-unit.target: 「啊，啊，啊！你没念开门咒。」

trans-unit.resname: REX·18 | Ravenous Tyrannosaurus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ravenous Tyrannosaurus
trans-unit.target: 血口霸王龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·18 | Ravenous Tyrannosaurus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Devour 3 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with three times that many +1/+1 counters on it.)\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one other target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
trans-unit.target: 吞噬3（于它进战场时，你可以牺牲任意数量的生物。此生物进战场时上面有该数量三倍的+1/+1指示物。） 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它对至多另一个目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。过量伤害改为对该生物的操控者造成之。

trans-unit.resname: REX·19 | Swooping Pteranodon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swooping Pteranodon
trans-unit.target: 扑袭无齿翼龙

trans-unit.resname: REX·19 | Swooping Pteranodon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste\nWhenever CARDNAME or another Dinosaur with flying enters the battlefield under your control, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains flying and haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, target land deals 3 damage to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷 每当CARDNAME或另一个具飞行异能的恐龙在你操控下进战场时，获得目标由对手操控之生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得飞行与敏捷异能直到回合结束。在下一个结束步骤开始时，目标地对该生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: REX·20 | Dino DNA | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dino DNA
trans-unit.target: 恐龙基因

trans-unit.resname: REX·20 | Dino DNA | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Imprint — {1}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery.\n{6}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card exiled with CARDNAME, except it's a 6/6 green Dinosaur creature with trample. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 压印～{1}，{T}：将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。只能于法术时机起动。 {6}：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标以CARDNAME放逐之牌的复制品，但它是6/6绿色，具践踏异能的恐龙生物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: REX·20 | Dino DNA | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Dinosaurs left their blueprints behind for us."\n—Mr. DNA
trans-unit.target: 「恐龙也留下了它们的蓝图，待我们去寻找。」 ～DNA先生
